about.title: About the Clinic
about.text: DOC University Clinic is a new multidisciplinary medical center providing quality medical services to broad segments of the population in accordance with state and international standards. According to the license, this clinic is authorized to conduct diagnosis and treatment of therapeutic, cardiological, pulmonological, pediatric, neurological and therapeutic dental diseases, diagnosis, conservative and surgical treatment of surgical, gynecological, urological and ENT diseases with anesthesiological and resuscitation support, and functional diagnostics (ultrasound) in outpatient and inpatient settings. The clinic is fully prepared to provide the above medical services to the country's citizens.

mission.title: Mission & Vision
mission.subtitle: Shaping the future through innovative education and research

missionContent.title: Our Mission
missionContent.text1: To provide high-quality education that empowers students to become innovative leaders and responsible global citizens through cutting-edge research and practical learning experiences.
missionContent.text2: We are committed to creating an inclusive learning environment that fosters critical thinking, creativity, and lifelong learning while addressing the challenges of our rapidly changing world.

visionContent.title: Our Vision
visionContent.text1: To be a globally recognized center of excellence in education and research, driving innovation and sustainable development in our region and beyond.
visionContent.text2: We envision a future where our graduates lead positive change in their communities, industries, and the world through knowledge, innovation, and ethical leadership.

valuesContent.title: Our Values
valuesContent.text1: Our core values guide everything we do and shape our university culture.
valuesContent.text2: These principles define who we are and how we work together to achieve our mission.

goalsContent.title: Strategic Goals
goalsContent.text1: Our strategic roadmap for achieving excellence and making a lasting impact.
goalsContent.text2: We have set ambitious yet achievable goals to guide our development over the coming years.

about.title: About the Faculty
about.description1: Salymbekov University is a higher education institution with modern clinical bases equipped with innovative medical equipment, modern material and technical base and highly competitive staff, including those with higher medical education, work experience and fluent English. The university is an international educational institution providing education for local and foreign students.
about.description2: Medical education is provided by the Higher School of Medicine. Classes include practice as well as theoretical and humanitarian disciplines. Practical classes and lectures are held in classrooms equipped with modern educational and medical equipment.

staff.title: Staff and Teachers
staff.description1: The main task of the university is to satisfy the market of educational services, ensure the export of knowledge and implement the program of successful introduction of multilingual education in the Kyrgyz Republic. The best teachers and leading specialists of our country are involved in the educational process. Training is conducted by highly qualified teachers, including more than 20 doctors and candidates of sciences. The main educational programs are created in accordance with the requirements of state educational standards.
staff.description2: The duration of study is 6 years for citizens of the Kyrgyz Republic, 5 years for foreign students. After graduation, the graduate is awarded the qualification 'Doctor'.

facilities.title: Educational Base
facilities.description1: The Higher School of Medicine has created and provided all conditions for educational and practical activities, as well as sports. Practical classrooms are equipped with visual aids, models of body parts and organs, mannequins and dummies.
facilities.description2: Laboratories and classrooms are equipped with multimedia equipment to expand learning opportunities:
facilities.description3: The database of educational programs and the library fund are replenished with printed and electronic publications of each student through access. Industrial practices are the most important part of personnel training in the healthcare system and an integral part of the educational process. The main goal of the practice is to acquire and improve practical knowledge and skills in patient care, diagnosis and medical care for future doctors, to familiarize themselves with the organization and working conditions of doctors in hospitals and medical centers.

values.title: Our Values
values.description: The main value and guarantors of stable development for the university are the teaching staff, employees and students. Teachers are the most important link in personnel training, since the teacher's qualifications, his pedagogical competence, working and living conditions, human and moral qualities play a key role in the training of highly qualified medical specialists.

policy.title: University Policy
policy.description1: The university adheres to the policy of providing quality education, all efforts are aimed at creating a leading educational institution that will be recognized as a leader among higher educational institutions of the Kyrgyz Republic.
policy.description2: We firmly believe that the set goals and objectives will be implemented through the implementation of the educational program and the active development of international relations. The faculty, as an open educational structure of the university, develops comprehensive international partnerships with other universities, government agencies and the public. The process of integration of the faculty, as well as the university itself, into the world educational space is developing through participation in various international scientific and educational programs.

businessSchool.description1: Founder of the Business School - Askars Maatkabylovich Salymbekov with graduates of 'Young Leaders of Kyrgyzstan'
businessSchool.description2: Salymbekov Business School is a unique educational center providing modern additional education to all segments of the population through its own public schools and special courses conducted according to a specially developed curriculum with a unique methodology of comprehensive trainings and motivational classes.
businessSchool.description3: Our unique educational projects, which have no analogues in the Kyrgyz Republic, were specially developed to cultivate a new generation of the country educated according to modern standards, where everyone could perfectly master three or more languages.

mission.title: Mission
mission.description1: The mission of the school is to provide quality services in five main areas that cover preschool education, elementary school students, middle and high school students, students and youth, as well as those who strive to learn foreign languages in a short period of time.
mission.description2: We can proudly say that our educational projects have stood the test of time and have helped thousands of our citizens to receive education in demand in the modern world. Our pupils and graduates have achieved great success in entrepreneurship, production, creativity, science, show business, etc.

founder.description1: Askars Maatkabylovich Salymbekov ‚Äì founder, public figure and philanthropist, honorary president of the Dordoi Association, founder of the Public Foundation 'Askar Salymbekov Foundation' for the implementation of educational, scientific, charitable, patriotic and environmental projects that have a great positive impact on the younger generation and youth.
founder.description2: In 2019, on his initiative, the Salymbekov University Institution was established, the main goal of which is to provide quality education using international technologies and standards for both citizens of the Kyrgyz Republic and foreign citizens. An important factor in the creation of the University was the need to create a common platform to unite all projects and created events into a single center for more effective management and control, as well as for the possibility of introducing quality affordable education for all categories of citizens.
founder.description3: Askar Salymbekov constantly provides financial assistance and support to socially vulnerable segments of the population, medical and social institutions, athletes, students, cultural and art figures, including by allocating funds to socially vulnerable segments of the population, contributing to the creation of feature and documentary films, publishing books and monographs, organizing archaeological excavations, training gifted students, reconstructing and restoring important historical buildings and structures in the country.

biography.title: Biography
biography.birthPlaceValue: At-Bashi village, At-Bashi district, Naryn region, Kirghiz SSR.
biography.educationDetails1: in 1977 graduated from the Faculty of History,
biography.educationDetails2: in 1990 ‚Äì Faculty of Economics ‚Äì 'Accounting, Audit and Control'

workExperience.item5: 1991-93 - Head of the Market Department of the Frunze City Executive Committee.

president.description1: Since its opening, the Salymbekov University Institution has strictly followed the principles of education quality, accessibility and maintaining education standards in accordance with international standards. The university is a multipurpose educational complex that includes innovative buildings in Bishkek and business schools in all regions of Kyrgyzstan.
president.description2: The main areas of the University's activity are the development of medical education, IT direction and the development of tourism and economics. As part of the policy being implemented, the International Faculty of Medicine was founded in 2019, which includes 2 departments.
president.description3: The university has modern infrastructure for quality student education. All classrooms of the academic building are equipped with multimedia auditoriums, medical laboratories with the latest equipment, convenient points for independent work and meals.
president.description4: All conditions have been created for quality education and comfortable living of students. The developed clinical base of the University is a special pride, since the practical approach in medicine is the foundation of educational activities.
president.description5: The university pays serious attention to the development of international activities. Joint educational programs with foreign partner universities are being implemented, and projects for students and teachers are regularly organized.
president.description6: The university is open to everyone! Our doors are open for applicants, students and future colleagues!

rector.description1: I am glad to welcome you to Salymbekov University, one of the most innovative and promising projects of the Askar Salymbekov Foundation, aimed at further development and improvement of the education system in the Kyrgyz Republic.
rector.description2: Salymbekov University is an accredited innovative educational institution providing quality education in the field of IT, medicine, business, personal growth and leadership development. Founded in 2019 as a continuation of the educational activities of the Askar Salymbekov Foundation, Salymbekov University has all the material, technical and human resources to train qualified specialists in the field of IT, business and medicine.
rector.description3: Salymbekov University is an internationally recognized educational institution included in the list of the World Health Organization (WDOMS), FAIMER Association, having Sponsor Notes from the international organization ECFMG and international accreditation based on the standards of the World Federation of Medical Education. The university is a member of the Association of Higher Educational Institutions and the Association of Creative Industries of Kyrgyzstan, as well as the International Modern Medical Academy of Sciences. The university is included in the limited list of universities that have access to Research for Life, SAGE and DeGruyter databases with access to electronic resources with more than 198,000 books and journals on medical and related topics.
rector.description4: Since its foundation, the university's international cooperation with leading universities and clinics in Germany, Turkey, Japan, South Korea, Malaysia, India, Pakistan, Russia, Ukraine, Uzbekistan, and Kazakhstan has been actively developing. Together with foreign partners, international scientific and practical conferences, master classes, lectures, seminars, academic mobility and professional development programs are organized annually with the involvement of the best foreign and domestic specialists.
rector.description5: Today, the International Faculty of Medicine, the International College of IT and Business, and the Salymbekov Business School with regional branches throughout the republic are successfully operating at the University.

The university is an internationally accredited educational institution recognized by international organizations (WFME, FAIMER, ECFMG).

section1.title: + Section 1. General Provisions
section1.content:
1. The University is established and operates for the purpose of conducting educational activities in the field of preschool education, primary, basic and secondary general education, primary, secondary, higher, postgraduate and additional professional education.
2. The University conducts fundamental and applied scientific research, experimental development, conducts research, development and technological work, carries out innovative and scientific-technical activities, expert, advisory and analytical work and services, and conducts personnel training.
3. To achieve its statutory goals and objectives, the University may engage in commercial and other types of activities in accordance with the current legislation of the Kyrgyz Republic and this Charter.
4. The University is independent in carrying out the types of activities specified in this Charter, developing and adopting local regulatory acts, and determining directions of international cooperation.

section2.title: + Section 2. Types and Directions of University Activities
section2.content:
The University aims to develop education, science and culture. It meets the needs of individuals and the state for quality education and specialist training, implements programs at all levels - from preschool to postgraduate, introduces innovations, develops scientific research and international cooperation.
The University also carries out a wide range of educational, scientific, cultural, innovative, entrepreneurial and other types of activities permitted by law.
All areas of work are regulated by the charter, laws of the Kyrgyz Republic and require licensing if provided by law.

Article 1. Goals of the University's Activities
1.1. Main Goals

Meeting the individual's needs for intellectual, creative, spiritual-moral and professional development.

Providing society and the state with qualified personnel with higher and secondary professional education.

Implementation of educational programs in preschool, general, professional, higher and additional education in accordance with state standards and accreditation requirements.

Introduction of modern and innovative educational technologies and programs.

Integration of education and science into the international scientific and educational space.

Development of scientific research and cooperation with industrial and scientific organizations.

Preservation and enhancement of cultural, moral and scientific values of society.

Promoting innovative and sustainable development of the country through scientific, analytical and economic activities.

Article 2. Main Types of University Activities
2.1. Educational Activities

Training of personnel in all forms of education and levels of education.

Teaching and upbringing according to general education and additional programs.

Implementation of additional general education programs, special courses, tutoring (including individual).

Implementation of shortened and accelerated programs for obtaining second education.

Training of specialists based on licenses from other universities, including foreign ones.

Retraining and advanced training of specialists.

Creating conditions for preparing dissertations for candidate and doctor of sciences degrees (including PhD).

Development and implementation of educational programs with issuance of certificates.

2.2. Scientific and Methodological Activities

Publishing educational and scientific materials.

Conducting fundamental and applied research, development and expert work.

International cooperation in the field of education, science and innovation.

Publishing monographs, textbooks and manuals.

Formation of a modern material and technical base for scientific work.

2.3. Organizational and Structural Activities

Creation of University divisions in the country and abroad.

Implementation of other types of activities corresponding to statutory tasks.

Article 3. Additional Types of Activities (non-core)
3.1. Creation of Infrastructure Facilities

Institutes, centers, laboratories, technoparks, workshops, publishing houses, theaters, museums, sports centers, dormitories, etc.

3.2. Paid Services

Advertising, consulting, scientific, translation, design, publishing, legal, medical and others.

3.3. Production Activities

Equipment repair, technical testing, modernization.

Production of products for university needs and third-party organizations.

Trade in goods (educational materials, equipment, furniture, etc.).

3.4. Social, Cultural and Sports Activities

Catering, dormitories, hotels, sanatoriums, camps, excursions, tourism.

Cultural events: concerts, performances, exhibitions, competitions.

3.5. Financial and Innovation Activities

Purchase of securities, placement of funds on deposits.

Management of rights to results of intellectual activity.

Implementation of innovative projects.

Leasing of property.

3.6. International Cooperation

Direct links with foreign educational organizations.

Organization of internships, practices, educational trips.

Article 4. Licensing and Legal Capacity

Activities requiring a license are carried out only after obtaining it.

Termination of the license entails termination of this type of activity.

The University has the right to hire domestic and foreign specialists.

Income-generating activities are allowed only if they serve statutory goals.

Article 5. Main Directions of Educational Activities
5.1. Main Educational Programs

General education programs - preschool, primary, basic, secondary.

Vocational training programs for workers and employees.

Primary vocational education programs.

Secondary vocational education programs.

Higher education programs - bachelor's, specialist, master's.

Postgraduate education programs - postgraduate, doctoral studies, etc.

5.2. Additional Educational Programs

General development and pre-professional programs.

Professional development and retraining programs.

5.3. Funding and Study Conditions

All types of educational services are provided on a paid basis under contracts.

The cost is determined by the University's estimate.

Benefits are possible for gifted students, orphans and students from low-income families.

5.4. Education Standards

The educational process is built according to state standards.

The development of the student's personality and a humanistic approach are ensured.

5.5. Right to Carry Out Educational Activities

The University implements all programs if it has the appropriate license.

The clinic is a leading medical institution at Salymbeko University and combines the high professionalism of doctors with an individual approach to patients

clinicalSUB.aboutText3: Our goal is to provide the patient with a comprehensive path from diagnosis to rehabilitation, using certified equipment and modern clinical treatment protocols
clinicalSUB.galleryDesc: Photos from the clinic and examples of conditions after procedures. Scroll the gallery horizontally.
clinicalSUB.equipmentDesc: High-precision equipment from world manufacturers, complying with international standards.

lazmed.description: Modern laser and aesthetic medicine clinic ‚Äî advanced techniques, comfort and individual approach
lazmed.aboutText1: The medical clinic "Lasmed" was founded in 2010 with a focus on providing high-quality professional medical services to the population. The clinic is an advanced medical institution at Salymbekov University and combines high professionalism of doctors with an individual approach to patients.
lazmed.aboutText2: The clinic is equipped with modern medical equipment. It has a modern operating unit, a postoperative ward for 7 people, a dressing room, a doctors' room, a massage room, a treatment room, doctors' offices by specialty (gynecologist, ENT, urologist, dermatocosmetologist), as well as service premises.
lazmed.aboutText3: Our goal is to provide the patient with a comprehensive path from diagnosis to rehabilitation using certified equipment and modern clinical treatment protocols.
lazmed.directorPosition: Surgeon, Candidate of Medical Sciences, highly qualified doctor in laser medicine and aesthetics
lazmed.directorText1: Chief physician of the clinic, initiator of the creation of Lasmed and one of the leading specialists in laser therapy. Has extensive experience in surgical practice and is engaged in the introduction of modern treatment methods and aesthetic medicine.
lazmed.directorText2: Under her leadership, the clinic has developed specialized areas: laser surgery, gynecological and urological services, dermatocosmetic care, diagnostic and laboratory research.
lazmed.servicesDesc: All procedures are performed in compliance with safety and quality standards

laserSurgery.title: Laser Surgery
laserSurgery.description: Unique properties of laser radiation help fight both aesthetic imperfections (warts, moles) and complex diseases such as foot deformities. Laser methods are safe and accurate.

laparoscopy.title: Laparoscopic Surgery
laparoscopy.description: Modern method of surgical intervention through small incisions (0.5-1.5 cm). Minimal tissue damage, faster rehabilitation and short hospital stay.

plastic.title: Plastic Surgery
plastic.description: Plastic surgery allows correcting the shape of the nose, ears, eyebrows, chin, lips; eliminating wrinkles and figure defects. Precise techniques are used for long-term results.

dermatology.title: Skin Diagnostics and Treatment
dermatology.description: Comprehensive diagnostics of skin diseases with an individual treatment plan (medication therapy, physiotherapy, laser techniques and cosmetic solutions).

ent.title: ENT (Ear-Nose-Throat)
ent.description: Diagnosis and treatment of diseases of the ear, throat and nose are important areas requiring a precise approach due to anatomical proximity to the brain. Comprehensive treatment is carried out in accordance with modern standards.

urology.title: Urology
urology.description: Conservative and operative urological treatment. Includes individual drug treatment taking into account sensitivity to antibiotics and modern laser methods.

massage.title: Massage
massage.description: A wide range of massage techniques ‚Äî up to 15 types of massage aimed at restoring and improving the condition of the musculoskeletal system and general well-being.

manual.title: Manual Therapy

dordoi.title: Medical Center LLC
dordoi.subtitle: Eye Microsurgery ¬´Dordoi-Ophthalmic Service¬ª
dordoi.description: Modern ophthalmological care: eye microsurgery, innovative laser technologies, custom prosthetics and contact lenses.

director.title: Director
director.name: Eshmambetov Asizbek Eshmambetovich
director.intro: Eshmambetov Asizbek Eshmambetovich ‚Äî Honored Healthcare Worker of the Kyrgyz Republic. Founder (1995) and permanent director of the Eye Microsurgery Medical Center ¬´Dordoi-Ophthalmic-Service¬ª and the only laboratory in Central Asia for manufacturing custom eye prosthetics.
director.history: The Eye Microsurgery Center ¬´Dordoi-Ophthalmic Service¬ª was established in 1996. Today, the center successfully develops and provides almost all types of modern ophthalmological services, earning the trust of the population of Kyrgyzstan and neighboring countries.
director.equipment: Equipment includes the ultrasonic phacoemulsifier LEGACI (USA) and the latest generation INFINITI (2016) device, which allows cataract removal without sutures with hospitalization of no more than one day.
director.labs: Unique laboratories operate successfully: for manufacturing custom eye prosthetics and producing soft contact lenses. Since 2000, the center has been a profitable enterprise and was recognized by the Ministry of Health as the best medical institution among non-governmental structures.
director.technologies: The use of microsurgical, laser and modern technologies allows bloodless plastic surgery to eliminate cosmetic defects of neoplasms with minimal risk of complications ‚Äî an alternative to heavy operations under general anesthesia.
director.conferences: Under the leadership of Asizbek Eshmambetov, together with the Department of Eye Diseases of the Kyrgyz State Medical Academy, Central Asian conferences on ophthalmology were organized for the first time in Kyrgyzstan (2002, 2007, 2011, 2015) with the participation of 250+ specialists from Russia, Ukraine, Kazakhstan, Uzbekistan, Tajikistan, Germany, Turkey, India, USA and Finland.
director.international: The center maintains ties with international specialists: a professor from Kazakhstan and a prosthetist from Moscow work here. Regular internships for doctors and nurses ensure mastery of new techniques.
director.charity: In 2016, a free complex of eye operations was provided to an institution for the elderly and people with disabilities (10‚Äì12 people).

introduction.paragraph1: In the vision of every Kyrgyzstani who hopes for a better future, by 2030 Kyrgyzstan will become a competitive country with a diversified economy, high per capita income, and a full and active member of the global community. To achieve this, we must focus on our main wealth - human resources.

mission.subtitle: Training modern personnel capable of implementing creative initiatives and innovative ideas for the benefit of society
mission.missionQuote: Training modern personnel capable of implementing creative initiatives and innovative ideas for the benefit of society.
mission.missionText1: Founded in 2019, Salymbekov University is a direct continuation of previously launched educational projects of the Askar Salymbekov Public Foundation established in 2012, which identified the most important areas for stimulating the development of human resources, education, science and the formation of a new generation of enlightened youth.
mission.missionText2: The Foundation has implemented many large projects related to training schoolchildren and students, publishing books, conducting seminars, round tables, forums and other platforms for various companies, organizations and educational institutions, as well as events with international lecturers. All these projects have allowed to train and educate more than 25 thousand people.
mission.mlkDescription: In 2014, the Foundation launched a successful educational project for youth - the Public School 'Young Leaders of Kyrgyzstan', which had a huge positive effect on the new generation. Its unique, unparalleled comprehensive courses of trainings and motivational classes gave students and youth the opportunity to master so-called 'Soft skills', new knowledge and skills for personal growth and leadership qualities formation.

charter.title: University Charter
charter.subtitle: Foundational document defining the mission, values and principles of our educational institution
charter.sectionsDescription: Review the key sections of our charter governing the university's activities

section1.title: General Provisions
section1.content:
Article 1. University Status and Mission

The University is an autonomous educational institution operating in accordance with legislation and this Charter. The main mission of the University is to provide quality higher education, conduct scientific research and contribute to the development of society.

‚Ä¢ Ensuring high quality education
‚Ä¢ Development of research activities
‚Ä¢ Training of competitive specialists
‚Ä¢ Promoting international cooperation

Article 1.1. Legal Basis

The University operates on the basis of the Constitution of the Kyrgyz Republic, the Law "On Education", other regulatory legal acts and this Charter.

section2.title: Governing Bodies
section2.content:
Article 2. University Management Structure

2.1. Supreme Governing Bodies
University management is carried out on the basis of combining principles of single authority and collegiality. The supreme governing bodies include:

‚Ä¢ Academic Council of the University
‚Ä¢ Board of Trustees
‚Ä¢ Rector's Office

2.2. Competence of Governing Bodies
Each governing body has clearly defined competence and powers enshrined in this Charter and internal regulations of the University.

Article 2.3. Rector's Powers
The Rector exercises general management of the University's activities and is responsible for fulfilling the tasks assigned to the University.

section3.title: Educational Activities
section3.content:
Article 3. Principles of Educational Process

3.1. Basic Principles
The educational activities of the University are based on the following principles:

‚Ä¢ Academic freedom and autonomy
‚Ä¢ Integration of education and science
‚Ä¢ Continuity and succession of education
‚Ä¢ International quality standards

3.2. Educational Programs
The University implements educational programs of various levels of higher education in accordance with the license and state accreditation.

Article 3.3. Quality Control
The University ensures constant monitoring and evaluation of the quality of educational programs in accordance with international standards.

section6.title: Students and Faculty
section6.content:
Article 6. Rights and Responsibilities of Educational Process Participants

6.1. Student Rights
University students have the right to:

‚Ä¢ Receive education in accordance with educational programs
‚Ä¢ Participate in shaping the content of their education
‚Ä¢ Free use of library and information resources
‚Ä¢ Participate in university management

6.2. Faculty Responsibilities
University teachers are obliged to:

‚Ä¢ Ensure high quality of the educational process
‚Ä¢ Systematically improve their qualifications
‚Ä¢ Observe academic ethics
‚Ä¢ Develop research activities

Article 6.3. Academic Mobility
The University creates conditions for academic mobility of students and teachers, including exchange programs with foreign universities.

section8.title: International Cooperation
section8.content:
Article 8. International Activities of the University

8.1. Principles of International Cooperation
The University develops international cooperation based on:

‚Ä¢ Mutual respect and equality
‚Ä¢ Academic mobility
‚Ä¢ Joint educational programs
‚Ä¢ Research projects

8.2. Forms of Cooperation
The main forms of international cooperation are:

‚Ä¢ Conclusion of agreements with foreign universities
‚Ä¢ Participation in international educational networks
‚Ä¢ Implementation of double degree programs
‚Ä¢ Organization of international conferences and seminars

Article 8.3. Document Recognition
The University ensures recognition of education documents in accordance with international agreements and conventions.

president.description1: Welcome to our Foundation's page! It is a great honor for me to lead an organization that has been making significant contributions to the development of our society for many years.

president.description4: In today's rapidly changing world, we continue to adapt to new challenges by implementing innovative approaches while preserving our core values.
president.description5: Each of our projects is the result of the coordinated work of a team of professionals who sincerely believe in the importance of our mission.
president.description6: We are open to cooperation and always welcome new partners who share our values and strive to create a better future.

rector.description1: Welcome to our university! It is a great honor for me to lead this educational institution that has become home to thousands of talented students and professionals.
rector.description2: Our mission is to provide quality education that meets international standards and prepares specialists who are in demand in the modern labor market.
rector.description3: We constantly work on improving the educational process, implementing new technologies and teaching methods so that our students receive relevant knowledge and practical skills.
rector.description4: The university is proud of its achievements in scientific activities and international cooperation. We actively develop partnerships with leading universities around the world.
rector.description5: We pay special attention to creating a comfortable educational environment where every student can reveal their potential and realize the most ambitious goals.
rector.description6: We believe that education is the key to a successful future, and we strive to make it accessible and high-quality for everyone who strives for knowledge.

developmentCouncil.title: Development Council
developmentCouncil.subtitle: Expert council defining strategic directions of university development
developmentCouncil.firstParagraph: The University Development Council is an advisory and consultative body consisting of leading experts in various fields of knowledge. The main task of the council is to develop and implement the university development strategy, determine priority areas of research activity and strengthen international cooperation.
developmentCouncil.foundationName: Foundation for Support of Education and Science
developmentCouncil.chairmanText2: , initiator and patron of the University construction. Has over 30 years of successful experience in business and social entrepreneurship.
developmentCouncil.chairmanText3: Under his leadership, numerous educational and social projects have been implemented aimed at developing human capital and strengthening the country's intellectual potential.
developmentCouncil.chairmanText4: Active supporter of innovations in education and development of international academic cooperation.
developmentCouncil.compositionDescription: The council includes recognized experts with international experience
developmentCouncil.memberText1: Doctor of Medical Sciences, Professor, Rector of the Kyrgyz State Medical Academy named after I.K. Akhunbaev. One of the leading specialists in the field of cardiology and healthcare organization.
developmentCouncil.memberText2: Author of more than 200 scientific works, under his guidance 25 candidate and 10 doctoral dissertations have been defended. Corresponding Member of the National Academy of Sciences of the Kyrgyz Republic.
developmentCouncil.memberText3: Actively participates in the development of state programs for healthcare development and medical education.
developmentCouncil.member1Text: Doctor of Economic Sciences, Professor, renowned specialist in economics and management. Has many years of experience in government bodies and academic environment. Author of fundamental research on economic development and strategic planning.
developmentCouncil.member2Text: Expert in information technology and digital transformation. Manager of large IT projects, specialist in implementing innovative solutions in the educational process. Active participant in international conferences on education digitalization.
developmentCouncil.member3Text: International expert in medical education from India. Professor with many years of experience in leading medical universities worldwide. Specialist in accreditation of medical educational programs and implementation of international quality standards.
developmentCouncil.member4Text: Representative of the European education system, expert in international cooperation and academic mobility. Has experience in Erasmus+ programs and other international educational initiatives. Specialist in developing joint educational programs.
developmentCouncil.member5Text: Japanese expert in engineering education and technological innovations. Professor at Tokyo University, specialist in robotics and artificial intelligence. Actively collaborates with educational institutions worldwide.
developmentCouncil.member6Text: Expert in agriculture and ecology. Doctor of Biological Sciences, author of innovative developments in sustainable development and environmentally friendly technologies. Participant in international research projects.

academicCouncil.description3: Council members ensure compliance of educational programs with modern requirements and international quality standards.

The Council operates in accordance with the legislation of the Kyrgyz Republic, the University Charter and this Regulation.
qualityCouncil.provisionsText2: The main goal of the Council is to develop and implement a quality management system that meets international standards and best practices in higher education.

mainTasks: Protection of rights, dignity, interests, safety and health of clinical trial participants
Control over compliance with patient rights when receiving medical care in university clinics
Resolution of moral and ethical problems related to publication of scientific research results
Regulation of ethical issues in research works and clinical trials
Compliance with international and national standards for new technology approval
Ensuring objective assessment of safety and inviolability of human rights
Identification of cases of violation of medical ethics and deontology principles
mainFunctions: Conducting ethical examination of scientific research projects
Quality ethical examination of clinical trial materials
Expert examination of research projects involving humans and animals
Analysis of ethical justification of clinical and biomedical research
Preparation of conclusions on the feasibility of conducting research
Control over compliance with ethical and legal norms during research
Study and application of international experience in ethical regulation
Organization of events on bioethical issues
Participation in ethical and legal education of medical workers
Expert evaluation of medical and pharmaceutical advertising
Development of methods for ethical education of university staff

section1.title: Organizational Structure
section1.content: The Student Council consists of representatives from all faculties and institutes of the university. The council includes a chairman, deputy chairmen, secretary and council members from each educational unit.

section2.title: Formation Procedure
section2.content: Members of the Student Council are elected at general meetings of faculty and institute students for one academic year. Elections are held at the beginning of each academic year.

section3.title: Rights and Responsibilities
section3.content: The Student Council has the right to make proposals for improving the educational process, participate in the development of local regulations, organize student events and represent student interests in various instances.

section4.title: Interaction with Administration
section4.content: The Student Council interacts with the rector's office, dean's offices and other university departments through regular meetings, conferences and working groups.

section5.title: Financial Activities
section5.content: The activities of the Student Council are financed from university funds, as well as through attracted funds from sponsors and partners. All financial transactions are carried out in accordance with the approved estimate.

section6.title: Reporting and Control
section6.content: The Student Council reports on its activities to the student conference at least once a year. Control over the council's activities is carried out through open reports and discussions.

greeting.title: Welcome to the Science Section
greeting.p1: Scientific work at the University is the activity of faculty, masters, graduate students, applicants and students aimed at forming and developing a research mindset among staff and students, solving current medical, humanitarian, socio-economic, pedagogical and other fundamental and applied tasks that contribute to improving the general cultural and professional level of graduate specialists.
greeting.p2: Scientific work is one of the main activities of the management and teaching staff. It is carried out in the interests of further developing the theoretical foundations of the disciplines studied, ensuring the organic unity of educational, methodological and scientific work, and improving the entire educational process.
greeting.p3: The focus of scientific work should meet the needs of the modern stage of social development, correspond to the profile of the University and its structural divisions, and contribute to the fullest realization of the creative potential of faculty and students.

scientificCouncil.title: Scientific and Technical Council
scientificCouncil.subtitle: Permanent advisory body of the University
scientificCouncil.generalText: The Scientific and Technical Council is a permanent advisory body of Salymbekov University. In its activities, the STC is guided by the regulatory legal acts of the Kyrgyz Republic; the Charter of the University, this Regulation and other local regulatory acts. The Regulation on the STC is approved by the decision of the Academic Council. The composition of the STC is approved by the order of the rector for the academic year no later than September 30 on the proposal of the vice-rector for scientific work based on the proposals of the heads of departments. The decisions of the STC on issues within its competence are advisory in nature.
scientificCouncil.goalsText: The purpose of the STC is to organize and coordinate activities when considering issues related to the implementation of state policy in the field of science and technology; development and improvement of the level of scientific research and innovation activities carried out in departments and other divisions, increasing the efficiency of training highly qualified scientific and pedagogical personnel (doctors and candidates of sciences) and research work of students.

bioethics.chairmanDesc: President of the Association of Medical Workers of the Kyrgyz Republic, professor, doctor of medical sciences, active member of the American College of Cardiology. Specialist in angioplasty, one of the safest methods of treating coronary heart disease and preventing myocardial infarctions.

youngScientists.generalText: The Council of Young Scientists (hereinafter CYS) of Salymbekov University is a public organization and is formed from among teachers, researchers, graduate students and masters of all structural divisions of the university under the age of 35. The composition of the CYS is approved by the rector of Salymbekov University.
youngScientists.goalsTitle: Goals and objectives of the council of young scientists
youngScientists.goalsText: The CYS is created with the aim of promoting the realization of the creative potential of young scientists and teachers of the university. section1.title: Mission and Vision
section1.content:
The mission of Salymbekov University is to provide quality education that develops critical thinking, creativity and social responsibility, preparing students for successful careers in the global community.

Our vision is to become a leading educational institution in Central Asia that shapes future leaders and innovators through advanced educational programs and research that meet international standards.

section2.title: Academic Development
section2.content:
Strategic goals in academic development:

‚Ä¢ Development and implementation of educational programs that meet labor market requirements
‚Ä¢ Integration of digital technologies into the educational process
‚Ä¢ Development of a continuous education system
‚Ä¢ Training of teaching staff of international level
‚Ä¢ Creation of centers of academic excellence
‚Ä¢ Implementation of mentoring and tutoring systems

section3.title: International Cooperation
section3.content:
University's global positioning strategy:

‚Ä¢ Establishing partnerships with leading universities worldwide
‚Ä¢ Participation in international educational and research projects
‚Ä¢ Development of academic mobility programs for students and teachers
‚Ä¢ Attraction of foreign students and teachers
‚Ä¢ Obtaining international accreditations
‚Ä¢ Participation in global educational initiatives

section4.title: Infrastructure and Technologies
section4.content:
Development of university's material and technical base:

‚Ä¢ Creation of a modern campus with innovative infrastructure
‚Ä¢ Equipping laboratories and classrooms with advanced equipment
‚Ä¢ Development of a digital educational platform
‚Ä¢ Implementation of artificial intelligence systems in educational process management
‚Ä¢ Creation of a comfortable and safe learning environment
‚Ä¢ Development of sports and social infrastructure

section5.title: Research and Innovation
section5.content:
Strategy for development of research activities:

‚Ä¢ Creation of research centers in priority areas
‚Ä¢ Attraction of grants for scientific research
‚Ä¢ Development of partnerships with industrial enterprises
‚Ä¢ Commercialization of scientific research results
‚Ä¢ Support for student startups and innovative projects
‚Ä¢ Publication of research results in international publications

section6.title: Social Responsibility
section6.content:
University's contribution to social development:

‚Ä¢ Implementation of affordable education programs
‚Ä¢ Support for talented youth from regions
‚Ä¢ Development of corporate social responsibility programs
‚Ä¢ Participation in solving social problems of society
‚Ä¢ Training specialists for the real sector of economy
‚Ä¢ Development of cultural and educational initiatives

strategicPlan.title: Strategic Development
strategicPlan.subtitle: Our comprehensive plan for future growth, innovation and sustainable development

section1.title: Vision and Mission
section1.content:
Our vision is to become a global leader in innovation and sustainable development.

We strive to create value for all stakeholders through advanced technologies, social responsibility and environmentally friendly practices. Our mission is to inspire change and shape a better future for the next generations.

section2.title: Strategic Goals
section2.content:
‚Ä¢ Increase global presence by 40% by 2026
‚Ä¢ Implement 100% renewable energy sources by 2025
‚Ä¢ Develop 15+ innovative products in the next 3 years
‚Ä¢ Achieve carbon neutrality by 2030
‚Ä¢ Increase R&D investments by 60% by next year

section3.title: Key Initiatives
section3.content:
Digital Transformation:
- Implementation of AI and machine learning in all business processes
- Creation of next-generation cloud infrastructure

Sustainable Development:
- Carbon footprint reduction program
- Partnerships with environmental organizations

Talent Development:
- Global leadership academy
- Mentorship and coaching programs

section4.title: Implementation and Monitoring
section4.content:
We have implemented a comprehensive strategy implementation management system:

‚Ä¢ Quarterly progress reviews
‚Ä¢ Real-time KPI dashboards
‚Ä¢ Early risk warning system
‚Ä¢ Regular performance audits

Each department is responsible for achieving specific goals, and a central strategy committee coordinates overall efforts.

transparency.title: Transparency

section1.title: General Provisions
section1.content:
The Accounting Policy of Salymbekov University College is developed in accordance with:

‚Ä¢ Law of the Kyrgyz Republic "On Education"
‚Ä¢ Tax Code of the Kyrgyz Republic
‚Ä¢ International Financial Reporting Standards (IFRS)
‚Ä¢ Internal regulations and provisions

The College maintains accounting of property, liabilities and business operations using double-entry method in accordance with the Chart of Accounts.

The Director of the College is responsible for organizing accounting. Direct accounting is carried out by the accounting department under the supervision of the Chief Accountant.

section2.title: Fixed Assets Accounting
section2.content:
Fixed assets accounting is maintained in accordance with IFRS (IAS) 16 "Property, Plant and Equipment":

‚Ä¢ Fixed assets include assets costing more than 10,000 KGS with a useful life of more than 12 months
‚Ä¢ Depreciation is calculated using the straight-line method
‚Ä¢ Useful lives are established in accordance with the fixed assets classification
‚Ä¢ Annual inventory of fixed assets is conducted

Educational equipment, computers, furniture and other fixed assets are accounted for at initial cost. Repairs and modernization of fixed assets are capitalized when they increase their useful potential.

section3.title: Revenue and Expense Accounting
section3.content:
Revenue and expense accounting is carried out in accordance with IFRS (IFRS) 15 "Revenue from Contracts with Customers":

‚Ä¢ Revenue from educational services is recognized evenly throughout the academic period
‚Ä¢ Tuition fees are approved by the Director's order for each academic year
‚Ä¢ Discounts and benefits are provided to certain categories of students according to internal regulations
‚Ä¢ Educational process expenses include salaries, educational materials, utilities and depreciation

Accounting is maintained on an accrual basis. All business transactions are confirmed by primary accounting documents.

section4.title: Tax Accounting and Reporting
section4.content:
Tax accounting is maintained in accordance with the Tax Code of the Kyrgyz Republic:

‚Ä¢ The College applies the general taxation system
‚Ä¢ Corporate income tax is paid at the rate of 10%
‚Ä¢ VAT is not applied in accordance with education legislation
‚Ä¢ Quarterly and annual tax reports are submitted
‚Ä¢ Reporting deadlines are strictly observed

Financial reporting includes:
‚Ä¢ Balance Sheet
‚Ä¢ Income Statement
‚Ä¢ Cash Flow Statement
‚Ä¢ Explanatory Notes

Reporting is subject to mandatory audit within the deadlines established by law.

payroll.title: Payroll Accounting
payroll.content:
Payroll accounting is carried out in accordance with labor legislation:

‚Ä¢ Salaries are paid twice a month
‚Ä¢ All mandatory contributions to the Social Fund are made
‚Ä¢ Working time and vacation records are maintained
‚Ä¢ Bonus and incentive systems are applied

inventory.title: Inventory Accounting
inventory.content:
Inventory items are accounted for at actual acquisition cost:

‚Ä¢ Educational materials, stationery, medicines are accounted as inventory
‚Ä¢ Write-off is done using the average cost method
‚Ä¢ Quarterly inventory of materials is conducted
‚Ä¢ Warehouse balance limits are established

grants.title: Grants and Targeted Funding Accounting
grants.content:
Targeted funds and grants are accounted separately:

‚Ä¢ Separate sub-accounts are maintained for targeted funds
‚Ä¢ Strict targeted use of funds is ensured
‚Ä¢ Separate grant reporting is provided
‚Ä¢ Grantor agreement terms are complied with

about.title: American Institute of Technology
about.subtitle: Modern IT education according to Silicon Valley standards
about.content: American Institute of Technology American Institute of Technology is a unique educational center offering a bachelor's program developed jointly with experts from Silicon Valley in San Francisco. American Institute of Technology provides students in Kyrgyzstan with a unique opportunity to receive education that meets international quality standards. While studying at AIT, students will have access to advanced technologies, modern laboratories and infrastructure supporting their academic and professional growth. The curriculum fully complies with the latest IT trends and requirements. It combines advanced knowledge and cutting-edge methods necessary for a successful career in IT. The educational programs offered by AIT focus on practical application of knowledge and skills in real projects so that students can apply their abilities immediately after completing their studies. The Institute Director, a graduate of the PhD program at Houston University and an employee of the international corporation 'Intel' Munara Tolubaeva is confident that the curriculum is developed taking into account the educational programs of leading American universities and with the participation of 14 leading specialists from American technology corporations such as Google, Apple, Amazon, etc.

about.content: Zhunushalieva Nurzat Manasovna is an experienced education leader with over 15 years of experience. Nurzat Manasovna has deep knowledge in pedagogy and educational process management. Education and qualifications: Higher pedagogical education, additional qualifications in education management and IT technologies. Active participant in international educational conferences and forums.

vision.content: My vision is to create an educational institution that not only provides knowledge but also shapes personalities ready for the challenges of the modern world. We strive to ensure that every student of our college receives not just a diploma, but real skills that will help them build a successful career in their chosen field. Our mission is to prepare competitive specialists capable of contributing to the development of the digital economy of Kyrgyzstan and the world.

message.content: Dear students, parents, and colleagues! I am pleased to welcome you to Salymbekov College - a place where future leaders of the IT industry and design are born. Our college is not just an educational institution, it is a community of like-minded people striving for knowledge and innovation. We create an environment where every student can unlock their potential, gain practical skills, and build a successful career. Our educational programs are developed taking into account the requirements of the modern labor market and promising technologies. I believe that education is the key to a successful future, and I am proud that our college contributes to the development of human capital in our country.

softwareDevelopment.title: Software Development
softwareDevelopment.subtitle: Become a sought-after specialist in the IT world and create innovative solutions

itEducation.title: IT Education at Salymbekov University
itEducation.content: Salymbekov University offers modern IT education that combines fundamental knowledge with practical skills in demand in the labor market. Our software development program is designed taking into account the latest trends in the IT industry and employer requirements. Students receive not only theoretical knowledge but also real project experience. We train specialists capable of creating complex software systems, working in teams, and adapting to rapidly changing technologies.

programDescription.title: Program Description
programDescription.content: The "Software Development" program covers all stages of software product creation - from requirements analysis to deployment and support. Students study object-oriented programming principles, algorithms and data structures, databases, web technologies, and mobile development. Special attention is paid to development methodologies and teamwork. Key program features: practice-oriented approach, work with real projects, mentoring support from experienced developers.

programGoal.title: Program Goal
programGoal.content: The main goal of the program is to train highly qualified software developers capable of creating reliable, scalable, and secure applications. You will learn: to design software system architecture, write clean and maintainable code, work with modern frameworks and tools, work effectively in teams, and manage projects. The program develops not only technical but also soft skills necessary for a successful career in IT.

careerOpportunities.title: Career Opportunities
careerOpportunities.content: Program graduates can work in various areas of the IT industry, from startups to large international companies. Our graduates successfully build careers as frontend and backend developers, mobile developers, DevOps engineers, testers, and analysts. Many continue their studies in master's programs or start their own IT businesses. The average salary of junior developers in Kyrgyzstan ranges from 25,000 to 50,000 soms, while experienced specialists can earn more than 100,000 soms.

mobileComputing.title: Mobile Computing and Development
mobileComputing.subtitle: Become an expert in creating mobile applications for iOS and Android

overview.title: Mobile Computing in the Modern World
overview.content: Mobile computing is one of the fastest growing areas of IT, covering application development for smartphones, tablets and other mobile devices. With the development of 5G technologies, cloud services and the Internet of Things, mobile applications have become an integral part of our daily lives. From banking operations to entertainment, from education to healthcare - mobile technologies have penetrated all areas. Our program trains specialists capable of creating innovative mobile solutions for various sectors of the economy.

specialist.title: Mobile Computing Specialist
specialist.content: A mobile computing specialist is a professional who develops, tests and maintains mobile applications for various platforms and devices. Such a specialist must have deep knowledge in the field of mobile operating systems, user interfaces, network technologies and security. They work with various programming languages, frameworks and development tools. Key competencies include: application architecture design, performance optimization, data security and creating a convenient user experience.

programGoal.title: Program Goal
programGoal.content: The main goal of the program is to train highly qualified mobile application developers capable of creating quality products for iOS and Android platforms. You will learn: to develop native and cross-platform applications, work with mobile databases, integrate APIs and third-party services, optimize applications for various devices and ensure the security of user data. The program also develops teamwork skills, project management and understanding of business requirements.

careerOpportunities.title: Career Opportunities
careerOpportunities.content: Program graduates can work in IT companies, startups, banks, retailers and other organizations that develop their own mobile applications. The mobile development market continues to grow, and the demand for qualified specialists remains high. Mobile developers can work both in the office and remotely, which makes this profession particularly attractive. The average salary of junior developers in Kyrgyzstan ranges from 25,000 to 45,000 soms, while experienced specialists can earn more than 80,000 soms.

generalEducation.title: General Education Department
generalEducation.subtitle: Fundamental preparation for successful future in any profession

department.title: General Education Department
department.content: General Education Department is the fundamental foundation of the entire educational process in our college. We provide quality training for students in basic general education disciplines that form the basis for subsequent professional education. Our department brings together experienced teachers who not only transfer knowledge but also cultivate critical thinking, analytical skills, and love for learning in students. We strive to create an environment where every student can unlock their potential, develop intellectual abilities, and prepare for successful mastery of professional disciplines.

foundation.title: Fundamental Knowledge
foundation.description: Deep study of core disciplines for solid educational foundation

individual.title: Individual Approach
individual.description: Considering each student's characteristics and personalized support

modern.title: Modern Methods
modern.description: Using innovative educational technologies and approaches

practical.title: Practical Orientation
practical.description: Connecting theoretical knowledge with real-life situations

headOfDepartment.name: Batrakeyeva Gulina
headOfDepartment.text: Dear students and colleagues! I am pleased to welcome you to the General Education Department of our college. Our team of teachers consists of highly qualified specialists who genuinely love their work and strive to share their knowledge with students. Our mission is not just to give you knowledge in general education disciplines, but to teach you to think critically, analyze information, and independently acquire new knowledge. We believe that quality general education is the foundation for successful professional growth in any field. We create a friendly and supportive atmosphere where every student can ask questions, express their opinions, and develop their abilities.

teachers.title: Our Teachers
teachers.subtitle: Professionals with extensive experience and love for teaching

teacher1.name: Alidzharova Mukaddas Zhuldashevna
teacher1.subject: Mathematics
teacher1.text: Mathematics is not just numbers and formulas, it is the language spoken by the entire Universe. In my classes, I try to show students the beauty and logic of mathematical thinking. I am convinced that mathematics develops not only computational skills but also logical thinking, analytical abilities, and problem-solving skills. These skills will be useful in any profession and in everyday life. My approach to teaching is based on understanding, not memorization. I help students see connections between different mathematical concepts and apply them in practice.
achievements: Winner of 'Teacher of the Year' competition

teacher2.name: Arykov Daniyar Kanybekovich
teacher2.subject: Physics
teacher2.text: Physics helps understand the fundamental laws by which our world exists. My goal is to make this subject interesting and accessible to every student. In classes, we not only study theory but also conduct experiments, solve practical problems, and discuss modern scientific discoveries. I consider it important to show students how physical laws work in everyday life and modern technologies. Modern physics is an amazing world full of discoveries and opportunities for creative thinking.

teacher3.name: Kurbanbayeva Nurgul Toktoshevna
teacher3.subject: Chemistry
teacher3.text: Chemistry is the science of substances and their transformations that surrounds us everywhere. From cooking to the latest medical drugs - chemistry is present everywhere. My classes are built on a combination of theory and practice. We conduct interesting experiments, study properties of substances and their interactions. Special attention is paid to safety and environmental responsibility. I strive to develop scientific thinking in students and understanding of chemical processes that occur in the world around us.

teacher4.name: Mazekova Nazgul Zholochievna
teacher4.subject: Biology
teacher4.text: Biology is the science of life in all its diversity. Studying biology, we explore the amazing world of living organisms and understand our place in nature. In my classes, students get acquainted with cell structure, organism functioning, and ecological relationships. We use microscopes, study herbariums, and discuss modern biotechnologies. Special attention is paid to environmental protection and sustainable development, which is especially relevant in the modern world.

teacher5.name: Pirimbaeya Zharkyn Zhusupzhanovna
teacher5.subject: History
teacher5.text: History is not just a list of dates and events, it is an exciting journey into the past that helps understand the present and foresee the future. In my classes, I try to bring history to life through stories about people, document analysis, and discussion of alternative viewpoints. We study not only political events but also culture, economy, and everyday life of different eras. My goal is to develop historical thinking in students, critical attitude towards information, and understanding of the world's cultural diversity.

teacher7.name: Toktoraliev Zherkinbek Torobekovich
teacher7.subject: Computer Science
teacher7.text: Computer Science in the modern world has become as necessary as reading and writing. I teach students not just to use computers, but to understand their working principles and create their own digital solutions. In classes, we study algorithms, programming, data work, and cybersecurity basics. Special attention is paid to developing computational thinking - a skill that will be useful in any profession. Modern technologies are developing rapidly, and my task is to prepare students for life in the digital world, teach them to adapt to new technologies and use them to solve practical problems.

about.title: About Medical Faculty
about.content: Medical Faculty of Salymbekov University Is a leading educational center for training medical personnel in Kyrgyzstan. We combine centuries-old traditions of medical education with modern technologies and innovative approaches to learning. The faculty is equipped with modern educational laboratories, simulation centers and clinical bases, allowing students to receive quality practice-oriented education. Our graduates successfully work in medical institutions in Kyrgyzstan and abroad.

curriculum.title: Educational Program
curriculum.subtitle: Modern educational program that meets international standards of medical education

year1.title: First Year of Study
year1.description: Fundamental Preparation The first year is dedicated to the study of basic medical and natural science disciplines. Students master the fundamentals of anatomy, histology, biochemistry and physiology. Key Disciplines: Human Anatomy, Medical Biology, General Chemistry, Biophysics, Fundamentals of Medical Terminology, Latin Language.

year2.title: Second Year of Study
year2.description: In-depth Study The second year focuses on pathological anatomy, microbiology and pharmacology. Students begin to study clinical disciplines. Main Courses: Pathological Anatomy, Microbiology, Pharmacology, Propaedeutics of Internal Medicine, General Surgery.

year3.title: Third Year of Study
year3.description: Clinical Preparation The third year marks the beginning of clinical training. Students study specialized medical disciplines and undergo their first practice. Clinical Disciplines: Internal Medicine, Surgical Diseases, Obstetrics and Gynecology, Pediatrics, Neurology.

year4.title: Fourth Year of Study
year4.description: Specialization The fourth year is dedicated to in-depth study of clinical disciplines and the beginning of specialization. The volume of practical training increases. Specialized Courses: Cardiology, Gastroenterology, Endocrinology, Traumatology, Urology, Ophthalmology.

year5.title: Fifth Year of Study
year5.description: Final Preparation The fifth year completes the main educational program. Students undergo intensive clinical practice and prepare for final certification. Final Disciplines: Disaster Medicine, Public Health, Forensic Medicine, Clinical Internship, Licensing Preparation.

departments.title: Department of Natural Sciences and Humanities
departments.subtitle: Fundamental training of future medical specialists
departments.history: History and General Information about the Department The Department of Natural Sciences and Humanities was founded in November 2019. The department employs qualified teaching staff with academic degrees and titles, actively engaged in both pedagogical activities and scientific work. The department carries out its activities in the following areas: ‚Ä¢ Educational activities ‚Ä¢ Teaching and methodological work ‚Ä¢ Research activities ‚Ä¢ Educational and organizational work The department staff constantly reviews and improves teaching materials, test questions, practical tasks, and lecture materials for students. The educational process is based on a modular rating system for assessing students' knowledge. For this system, questions, tickets and tests of different complexity levels have been developed.
departments.educationalActivity: Educational Activities of the Department The educational activity of the department consists of providing basic knowledge for students and staff for the further development of students as medical professionals. Periodically, department staff review and improve methodological materials, tests, practical tasks, and lectures for students. The educational process operates on the basis of a point-rating system for assessing students' knowledge. For this purpose, questions, tickets and tests of different complexity levels have been developed. Teachers conduct classes for first and second year students including areas by cycles such as: ‚Ä¢ Humanities, Social and Economic Cycle ‚Ä¢ Mathematical and Natural Science Cycle ‚Ä¢ Professional Cycle
departments.disciplines: Department Disciplines ‚Ä¢ Kyrgyz Language and Literature ‚Ä¢ Russian Language ‚Ä¢ English Language ‚Ä¢ Latin Language ‚Ä¢ History of Kyrgyzstan ‚Ä¢ History of Medicine ‚Ä¢ Philosophy ‚Ä¢ Manas Studies ‚Ä¢ Psychology ‚Ä¢ Economics ‚Ä¢ Jurisprudence ‚Ä¢ Computer Science ‚Ä¢ Geography of Kyrgyzstan ‚Ä¢ Physical Education
departments.methodologicalWork: Teaching and Methodological Work of the Department The teaching staff of the department carries out teaching and methodological work, including the development of textbooks, monographs, work programs and syllabi. There are all technical and information capabilities for conducting modular-rating control of students' knowledge. For some disciplines, modules are taken in the Ebilim test system. To activate independent work, develop the ability and skills to work with scientific literature, programs for students' independent work have been developed.
departments.morphoPhysiological: Morpho-Physiological Training The department provides fundamental training in morphological and physiological disciplines, which form the basis for understanding clinical sciences. Students study anatomy, histology, physiology and other basic medical sciences. The laboratories are equipped with modern equipment for practical classes and scientific research.
departments.clinicalDepartment: Clinical Training The clinical department is responsible for preparing students for practical medical activities. Students study at the university's clinical bases, where they acquire practical skills under the guidance of experienced doctors. Special attention is paid to simulation training and working with real clinical cases.

about.description1: Doctor of Philosophy (Ph.D.) in Medicine at Salymbekov University is focused on conducting scientific research and advanced study of medicine.

about.description3: The duration of the Ph.D. program in Medicine at Salymbekov University is 3 years. Students are also required to undergo additional training in research methods, statistics and relevant subjects.

history.title: College History
history.subtitle: The journey of establishment and development of Salymbekov University College

images.backgroundAlt: Main building of Salymbekov University College

introduction.paragraph1: Salymbekov University College was founded in 2019 as an innovative educational institution combining the best traditions of medical education and modern educational technologies. The college became an important part of the Salymbekov University educational ecosystem, offering quality secondary vocational education programs.
introduction.paragraph2: Over the years, the college has established itself as a reliable partner in training qualified medical professionals in demand in the labor market. We are proud of our graduates who successfully work in leading medical institutions of the country.

milestones.title: Key Development Milestones
milestones.subtitle: Important stages in our college history

2019.title: College Foundation
2019.description: In 2019, Salymbekov University College was founded with the aim of training highly qualified mid-level medical professionals. The college started its work with three main training directions.
achievements: Creation of material and technical base
Establishment of partnership relations with clinics

2020.title: Development and Digitalization
2020.description: During the pandemic, the college successfully transitioned to distance learning, implementing modern educational platforms. New training directions were opened and the clinical base was strengthened.

2021.title: Recognition and Accreditation
2021.description: The college successfully passed state accreditation and received recognition as one of the leading institutions of secondary vocational medical education in the region.

2022.title: Innovation and Expansion
2022.description: The college continues to develop, implementing innovative educational methods and expanding international cooperation. Partnership relations were established with educational institutions abroad.

aboutAIT.title: About Institute
aboutAIT.subtitle: American Institute of Technology - Your Gateway to World-Class IT Education
aboutAIT.content:
The American Institute of Technology (American Institute of Technology) is a unique educational center offering a bachelor's program developed in collaboration with experts from Silicon Valley in San Francisco.

The American Institute of Technology provides students in Kyrgyzstan with a unique opportunity to receive education that meets international quality standards. While studying at AIT, students will have access to advanced technologies, modern laboratories, and infrastructure that supports their academic and professional growth.

The curriculum fully complies with the latest trends and requirements of IT. It combines advanced knowledge and best practices necessary for a successful career in IT. The educational programs offered by AIT focus on the practical application of knowledge and skills in real projects, so that students can apply their skills immediately after completing their studies.

The Head of the Institute, Munara Tolubaeva, a graduate of the PhD program at the University of Houston and an employee of the international corporation 'Intel', is confident that the curriculum is developed taking into account the educational programs of leading American universities and with the participation of 14 leading specialists from American technology corporations such as Google, Apple, Amazon, etc.
